item.title: Trying polars, a fast DataFrame library
item.description: pandas is the de facto standard DataFrame manipulation tool in Python. Natually, I want to be comfortable using it but, I think the sheer girth of its API is proving to be a major obstacle. I can’t go for long before I have to search usages on Stackoverflow for what should be routine tasks. I don’t think I can ever grok its date time API. So, I searched for simpler alternative libraries and found polars.
